# XlsxFormulaResolver.HasAutoFilter property

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the auto filter is enabled. The dafault is No.

```csharp
public YesNo HasAutoFilter { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

Yes if auto filter is enabled; otherwise, No.
